user.title: Connect to Panasonic Blu-ray Player
user.description: Enter the IP address of your Panasonic Blu-ray player. For UHD models (DP-UB series), you may need a player key for remote control commands.

data_description.host: IP address of your Blu-ray player (e.g., 192.168.1.100)
data_description.name: Friendly name for this player

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate Panasonic Blu-ray Player
reauth_confirm.description: The player at {host} requires re-authentication. Please enter the player key.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to device. Ensure it's on the same subnet and Remote Device Operation is enabled in player settings.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid player key for UHD model.
